org.wonderly.jini2.config
Interface ManagedConfiguration

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigurationManager
public interface ManagedConfiguration
extends Remote

This interface describes the operations a service should provide to support remote Configuration management. It provides methods to get and update ConfigurationSet instances associate with a particular ConfigurableId. It also provides a listener interface to allow RemoteEvents to be fired to tell other entities of changes in the ConfigurationSet
